description: Primary key for the comment record.
Foreign key to the specific work order–asset–procedure line this comment refers to.
Technician or system-entered text describing observations, work performed, or instructions for the procedure.
Datetime when this comment was created in the system.
Datetime of the most recent update to this record by any process.
User or system process that created the comment.
Boolean indicator controlling whether the comment appears on printed outputs (e.g., work orders or invoices).
Code or bitmask denoting the originating context or display targets for the comment; likely drives visibility. Confirm with SME.
Flags controlling whether/how the comment is copied when duplicating related records (work orders, assets, procedures, schedules); likely a bitmask. Confirm with SME.
Optional reference to the related asset when not derived from the WOAP link; likely asset ID. Confirm with SME.
Optional reference to a maintenance procedure definition associated with this comment. Confirm with SME.
Optional reference to a preventive maintenance schedule or plan tied to this comment. Confirm with SME.
User who last modified the comment.
Datetime when a user (as opposed to a batch/system job) last modified the record.
Internal identifier of the user who created the comment.
Datetime recorded in user audit fields for when the comment was created; may differ from system create_date.
Internal identifier of the user who last modified the comment.
Datetime recorded in user audit fields for the last user modification.
